channel.title: Planet Kewl Radio Podcast
channel.description: Planet Kewl Radio is bringing you the best in Hip-Hop,R&B, and Reggae/Dance Hall music, along with funny,intelligent, and thought provoking conversation. Share our world as your world and let's Kewl the Planet together.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Give it a listen!
channel.itunes:author: BaBaStreets
channel.itunes:summary: Planet Kewl Radio is bringing you the best in Hip-Hop,R&B, and Reggae/Dance Hall music, along with funny,intelligent, and thought provoking conversation. Share our world as your world and let's Kewl the Planet together.

item.title: The BaBaGaZoo Show Episode 1
item.description: I just wanted to do a quick show to talk about our live show coming up on 1/13/12. I hope you enjoy this one. 1. Pete Rock Ft. Rell...That's What I'm Talking About 2. Common Ft. Jill Scott... I Am Music 3. Little Brother... When Everything Is New 4. Electric Wire Hustle... Buy Some Land, Put A House On It 5. Stephanie McKay... Tell It Like It Is 6. Melanie Rutherford... One Conversation 7. Julien Dyne Ft. Black Spade... Talk the Talk 8. Ari Lennox... Music Industry Agitation Song 9. The Roots Ft Cody ChesnuTT... The Seed 10. Dierdre Gaddis... Blackness 11. Dj Jazzy Jeff Ft. Shawn Stockman And Cy Young... How I Do 12. Pharoahe Monch... Free
item.dc:creator: BaBaStreets

item.title: Planet Hip-Hop Episode 1
item.description: For my first show I interviewed Smurftrill out of Atlanta Ga. To learn more about him go to smurftrill.com. Planet Hip-Hop Episode 1 1. Xzibit Ft. Anthony Hamilton... The Gamler 2. Little Brother Ft. Darien Brockington... The Becoming 3. Wale Ft. Bun B & Dre... The Shyt 4. Smurftrill... Stupid Grind 5. UGK Ft. Jermaine Dupre... Money,Hoes, & Power 6. 9th Wonder & Buckshot Ft. Legacy & Joe Scudda 7. Young Jeezy Ft. Fabolous & Jadakiss 8. Jon Connor... The Boom Bap Symphony 9. Yelawolf Ft. Reakwon... I Wish 10. Common Ft Nas... Ghetto Dreams 11. Big Boi Ft. Raekwon & André 3000... Royal Flush 12. Big K.R.I.T. Ft . 8-Ball, MJG & 2 Chainz... Money On The Floor
item.dc:creator: BaBaStreets

item.title: The All Men Movement Show Episode 2
item.description: Sorry for the wait but I'm back and doin it movin. The All Men Movment Episode # 2 1. Beborah Cox... No Body Supposed To Be Here 2. Joe... Slow Kisses 3. Raheem Devaughn... Text Me 4. Jamie Foxx Ft. Ne-Yo & Fabolous... She Gor Her Own 5. Leela James... It's Over 6. Marsha Ambrosius Ft. Fabolous... I Hope She Cheats On You 7. Urban Mystic... Why 8. Novel... Broken Record 9. Jasmine Sullivan... Excuse Me

item.title: The Bobby Black Show
item.description: This is the first show for Bobby Black in a long time but he is back and asking some very important questions that that need to be answered. Playlist 1. Jean Grae Ft. Pharoahe Monch & Royce Da 5'9"...Assassins 2. David Banner Ft. 9th Wonder...Diamonds on My Pinky 3. Talib Kweli...Black Girl Pain 4. Alpha.live Ft.Bashiri Asad... Wait a Minute 5. Kanye West Ft. Kid Kudi & Raekwon... Gorgeous 6. Actual Proof Ft. Drique London...Take It Back 7. D12... Let's Go 8. Royce Da 5'9" Ft. Joe Budden... My Own Planet 9. Slaughterhouse Ft. Dres... Back On The Scene

item.title: This is the Life,Love & Living show with your host Freddy G Episode 1
item.description: This show is a mix of two live versions of Anthony Hamilton's song and the original...I hope you enjoy Cornbread, Fish & Collard Greens unplugged Cornbread, Fish & Collard Greens original Better Days unplugged Better Days orignal
